title: Learn More: Arcade Boss World Event

replies.body: It's a free game. I'm glad they can find fun ways to keep the dollars rolling in. That means it can stay this way. Crazy.
Looks like Riot's trying to profit from the work they do...
I am both amused and pleased that you wrote this xD
You don't have to buy anything.
All I want is Arcade Poro ward. Rather keep the $$ on new star guardian skin set soon.{{champion:103}}
100% agree with you.{{champion:103}} for days.
Is it exactly 8 assists that you need to get or can it be over 8? If it's exactly 8, that seems a but hard :/ I feel like people will just int or not help once they have 8 assists.
it'd be at least 8 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Is there a typo with the blitzcrank mission line? Shows a reward of 10 tickets for mission 3. Also mission 3 is the same as mission 1.
Heya! There was a typo (nice pickup) the new mission is up there now with a 30 ticket reward, but I imagine you've already crushed it right?

notice me riot senpai!
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Noticed, young Padawan. May the Cosmic Pandas of old smile upon you.
thank you {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
From what i see they don't like blitzcrank or poros because they have their stuff on the under level items riot please i main blitzcrank
